GameDBStringTable.LocalizedStrings:
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_START_LVL3 Seek the Lost Fleet ship
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_CRUS_BASE_1 Occupy near bases 1/4 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_CRUS_BASE_2 Occupy near bases 2/4 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_CRUS_BASE_DONE <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Occupy near bases 3/3 - Finished</color>
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_1 Conquer Tumori bases 0/5 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_2 Conquer Tumori bases 1/5 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_3 Conquer Tumori bases 2/5 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_4 Conquer Tumori bases 3/5 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_5 Conquer Tumori bases 4/5 OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BASES_DONE <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Occupy near bases 5/5 - Finished</color>
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FREE_FOSSORIANS Liberate besieged Fossorians OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FREE_FOSSORIANSHIP_DONE <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Liberate besieged Fossorian - Finished</color>
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SWARM Weaken the Swarm OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SWARM_DONE <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Weaken the Swarm - Finished</color>
OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIP Get <color=SOTS_COLOR_RED>Princess</color> to the ship OBJECTIVE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIP_DONE <color=SOTS_COLOR_MOVEMENT>Get Princess to the Ship - Finished</color>
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_1 That was some good flying. Princess did not even land in a bog this time. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_1 Shut up, Viky! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_1 You did WHAT?! So that explains the mud all over the cockpit ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_2 Haw about we concentrate on the important stuff?! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_2 Like, why did we land so far from the area we want to search through ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_3 I spotted Fossorian shuttles landing east. I changed course so they would not spot us. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_3 Away from the Fossorians. Any dangers ahead? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_2 This was the battlefield of the last crusade! How to put it mildly ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_4 Tumori kicked our asses so hard we abandoned the idea of crusades for good ... and I said that rather mildly. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_4 So that's why Chiquita's navicomp displayed so many empty bases! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_3 Yes. Let's occupy those empty bases first and ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_5 Good, let's get the party started! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_4 Wait! ... I wanted to say: wait! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_5 I did not know Princess possessed such powers! Every day, you are closer to ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_6 Get your head down from the clouds, Viky. If it wasn't for the teleport pads, I would probably kill you by materializing you inside a rock or something. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_5 We have split up too quickly! At least let's check the connection. How do you read me? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_6 Clear! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_7 Can't hear shit! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_VIKTAR_7 Every time the Princess builds a little bit of greatness, she has to immediately tear it down! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_PRINCESS_8 Yes, I have to! I am surrounded by people who become all too easily fanatical over a religion. I don't want to lose friends to gain followers every time I do something "flashy". MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_STARTIN_TIN_6 Well, let's claim the empty bases. Then we set north towards the coordinates. We deal with the problems as they come ... and I bet they come pretty soon. S
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_1 Guys, there is something wrong. I did not notice at first, but I can sense patches in the psychosphere all around the place. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_TIN_1 Is that your sister's work? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_2 No ... these are too old. I think they are obscuring something ... I am curious ... what if I look here, under the biggest patch. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_3 It's like moving water with bare hands, it just keeps flowing back ... Wait! I got it! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_VIKTAR_1 The ship! Lord Hierarch was right the whole time! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_TIN_2 I KNEW IT! We bear witness to the last day of UNSS fleet dominance! But ... I guess that force field will be a problem. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_4 It will. It is too strong to blast through, and the ship is the source, so no chance to weaken it from outside. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_VIKTAR_2 What about teleportation? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_5 My powers are not a magic solution to everything! There is no teleportation gate in there that would give me a solid anchor in space. Not to mention that self-teleportation is crazy difficult. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_VIKTAR_3 So what can we do? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_PRINCESS_6 Maybe if I "knock" on the force field, the ship will respond. Blind Fury recognised me when I struck her. But I must get really close. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_SHIPRINCESS_TIN_3 Then we're going to get you there.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_1 Cyberbugs? Here? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_RH_1 Your face is familiar, Fossorian! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_2 Damn right it is familiar! I am ... I was the Supreme Leader. At least when I first met you! You belonged to that pirate, Annika, right? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_TIN_1 He is on the UNSS leach! Surely he has already informed the Princess's sister about our presence! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_3 To be bombarded from orbit with you?! And if you remember correctly, Tin, I deserted before we could cross blades! As a result, you are looking at a Penal Legion commander... what an irony. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_PRINCESS_1 What are you doing here? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_4 Fighting the Tumori! But we've stepped into some kind of trap, and the whole assault has folded like a house of cards. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_VIKTAR_1 What trap? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_5 A giant swarm of fireflies. At first, they seemed harmless, but then ... furry leg! I never ran so fast in my life! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_TIN_2 I don't trust him! He is here following your sister's orders! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_6 HA! I had to carry her in my backpack back then, but I am no longer her slave! I can prove it! Help me save my lads, and I'll tell you how to get rid of that swarm! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_TIN_3 Listen, you furry bastard ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_PRINCESS_2 Agree! We will help you, general. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_TIN_4 We do what?! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_PRINCESS_3 I am different than my sister. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_FURRET_FURRET_7 Words worthy of a queen!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_TUMORI_TUMORI_1 ---..,,,your death---,,,..-..,,is coming. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_MEETIN_TUMORI_RH_1 So much for a discussion.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSA_1 Cyberbugs, dude! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSB_1 Furry leg, dude! I see them! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSA_2 What do we do now, dude? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSB_2 I have no clue, dude! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FURRET_1 I tell you what to do, you two dimwits! You say thank you. Politely ask to be excused and change the uniforms cause those Cyberbugs are allies, now! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSA_3 Yes, Supreme Leader! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FURRET_2 Call me Supreme Leader one more time, and you'll be feeding worms! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FOSSB_3 That's not so bad ... Ahhh! It already hit me! ... As you wish, Supreme Leader! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FURRET_3 [SNOUT HIDDEN IN PALMS] Pfff... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_TIN_1 What a great acquisition, those two! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FURRET_4 The smart ones usually don't end up in the Penal Legion. Be happy, that they are at least not half-breeds ... you would see the horrors. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_PRINCESS_1 Tell us about the trap, General. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_FURRET_5 Before our attack lost momentum, we managed to conquer several Tumori bases, and each time some of the fireflies left that murderous swarm. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_VIKTAR_1 Maybe the swarm depends on the health of the Tumori bases! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_PRINCESS_2 Or the bases produce some kind of a pheromone, holding the swarm together! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_FOSSORIAN_FREE_TIN_2 The science behind it is not important! The key is the more Tumori bases we conquer, the fewer fireflies that swarm has!
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_1 Tell me about my sister Furret. You two were close before her metamorphosis? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_1 Heh, close ... She made me from a baffling buffoon into the leader of all Fossorians. For which I am grateful, I guess ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_2 What happened next? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_2 I thought the killing would end, but then, I was helping her to get a new body and enslave the UNSS ... after that, I was not of much use, so she ditched me. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_3 She ditched you? I mean, you two must have shared the same bond as I have with Tin ... and Annika. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_3 Yeah, she inherited some things. She is stubborn and ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_4 ... and? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_4 She doesn't trust anybody. Maybe that's why she cares so little for her subordinates. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_5 Why? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_5 I had a good friend. At least I thought so ... When things started to heat up, he changed his coat. A lesson she took seriously. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_6 My species is wired that way. We form a personality in a few days. Absorbing all information, synchronising with the world around us ... to be able to ... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_6 ... rule! Am I supposed to believe that is not your goal? That you're different from your sister? Or your big old mommy? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_PRINCESS_7 My sister embraced the Almother within. But I realise that the more I take from my genetic memory, the less of "me" is left. There is power, and there is a price. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_ABOUT_RELIC_FURRET_7 Well said ... You are full of surprises, Princess.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_RH_1 That was the last Tumori base! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_1 A nice view seeing those damn fireflies exit the scene. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_PRINCESS_1 You told us the truth about the swarm, Furret ... But you also used that honesty to hide something else. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_2 Yes, all I said about the Penal Legion was a lie. I am still the Supreme Leader ... and your sister sent me here for the same reason you came, the Cyberbug ship. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_3 With the whole Fossorian might. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_TIN_1 I knew you he cannot be trusted! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_PRINCESS_2 If you wanted to use that army, you would have attacked without warning. You do not want to fight us, right? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_4 Right. I think I will report we found only the Tumori and trees. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_PRINCESS_3 Why do you keep returning to my sister? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_5 We Fossorians were slaves. We stole the ships from the warlords of our homeworld. Your sister could open the path for their retribution. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_PRINCESS_4 I am not my Sister. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_RELIC_FURRET_6 I know now. Farewell, Princess ... and good luck.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_LAST_TUMORI_BF_SHAMAN_1 .,,,--for centuries .-.,--tribes guard the evil ..,,--that hides.,,-----.,.-, behind the shield---. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_LAST_TUMORI_BF_PRINCESS_1 We do not want to use the ship against your people! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_LAST_TUMORI_BF_SHAMAN_2 -*...--prove it....,, leave this place ..,,...never return.,- MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_LAST_TUMORI_BF_PRINCESS_2 I cannot. I must speak with the ship first. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_LAST_TUMORI_BF_SHAMAN_3 ----,,.-I knew ,.-.,,.,.-words of the Outworlders .,-.,.,---cannot be-.. trusted.,,.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_1 I am inside the shield... guys, do you hear me? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_1 NO ONE CAN HEAR YOU! I AM BRIGHT STAR AND THIS IS MY ENCLAVE OF SILENCE, A WALL AGAINST THE LITANY. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_2 You are awake! I ... I came to ask you for help. I am seeking the others, the Lost Fleet. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_2 OTHERS? MANY TIMES I HAVE SEARCHED FOR THE OTHERS IN THE PSYCHOSPHERE AND FOUND EVERY LAST OF THEM. BODIES BROKEN, SOULS LOST. I AM ALONE. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_3 What? No! There have to be others! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_3 THE GRAND ZIEREGALS WERE TOO THOROUGH. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_4 Grand Zieregals?! Why would they destroyed their own fleet? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_4 THERE WAS SOMEONE ELSE WHO KNEW THE LITANY. THE DAY WE CONQUERED THIS SYSTEM. A VOICE LIKE YOURS! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_5 So one of my sisters wanted you dead? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_5 DEAD? NO! THE VOICE CALLED FOR HELP! THE GRAND ZIEREGALS DECIDED TO DESTROY THE FLEET RATHER THAN LOSE CONTROL! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_6 After all the effort, there is no way we can defeat the UNSS fleet. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_6 I AM AWARE OF THE HESPERIDIAN-MADE SHIPS SERVING THE UNSS. SOMETIMES, WHEN I GOT TOO LONELY, I LOWER MY SHIELD AND LISTENED TO THEIR VOICES. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_7 The UNSS ships have voices? They are conscious too?! MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_7 LIKE LITTLE KIDS BUT THEY ARE MY KIN. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_8 So, if you wanted, you could speak to them? MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_8 YES, I CAN. I CONSIDERED RUNNING AWAY FROM THE SYSTEM AND TAKING THEM WITH ME, BUT ANYONE WHO KNOWS THE LITANY COULD STOP US. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_PRINCESS_9 The Grand Zieregals are dead and no one except me and sister can broadcast the Litany to the whole fleet. I think I have a new plan, but I will need your help. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_END_SHIP_9 I AM YOURS TO COMMAND.
MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BF_RH_1 --...--.-you seek -,,,-evil....you find -,,,-evil..,,. MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BF_RH_2 ---we do,.-not -...,,,let your...reach... MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BF_RH_3 ,,,.-..if you get,,,..the weapon-...Tumori are doomed.,-- MESSAGE_CAMPAIGN_CRUSADERS_LVL3_TUMORI_BF_RH_4 .,,,that think...must not..,,,reach the sky,...- again
